offer.title: Service Your Way
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at Concord Honda. Maximum discount $250. Please present coupon when service order is written. Taxes and hazardous waste disposal fees extra. Not valid in conjunction with other coupons or discounts (oil change, drains or refill services). Tires are excluded. Other restrictions may apply.  Limit one coupon per VIN #.  Honda models only. See your service professional for details.

offer.title: Battery Replacement
offer.disclaimer: Coupon not valid with any other offer. Must present coupon at time of purchase. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Other Restrictions may apply. Void where prohibited. See your service professional for details.

offer.title: Brake Service
offer.details: Front or rear brake pad replacement. Max Discount $60
offer.disclaimer: Must be presented at time of write-up. Not valid with any other offers or in-store specials. Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees ($5.65). Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details.
